## TsrpcError class

A unified Error that returned by TSRPC server or client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TsrpcError implements TsrpcErrorData 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [TsrpcErrorData](./tsrpc-proto.tsrpcerrordata.md)

## Remarks

It has many uses, for example:

1. You can handle business errors and network errors uniformly. 2. In API handle process, `throw new TsrpcError('xxx')` would return the same error to client directly (like `call.error()`<!-- -->), while `throw new Error('XXX')` would return a unified "Server Internal Error".
